title: MUSA 5080 Portfolio
text:
This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (MUSA 5080).


Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.




Weekly Notes: My learning reflections and key concepts
Labs: Completed assignments and analyses
Final Project: Capstone modeling challenge




Hi all!! I’m Zihang Yang from Shenzhen, China — go by Henry. Currently I’m on my Master’s studies of Smart Cities — City Planning in UPenn, graduating in 2026. After my five years of undergraduate studies in Urban Planning and Design, I’m equipped with 2D/3D design and data analysis skills. Always welcome to talk furtuer about spatial data analysis and urban planning stuffs!




Email: henryyzh@upenn.edu
GitHub: @henryyzh1
